entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
